description: Sandwich raspberry ice-cream between white chocolate cookies, then dip in melted dark chocolate to make a yummy, make-ahead frozen dessert.
name: Choc-Raspberry Ice-Cream Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2L Woolworths hokey pokey ice-cream, slightly softened

recipeInstructions.text: Line a 22.5 x 33cm (5cm deep) baking dish with baking paper. Spoon ice-cream into dish. Press raspberries into ice-cream and, using back of a metal spoon, smooth top. Freeze for 3 hours or until firm.

Turn ice-cream onto a chopping board. Discard baking paper. Working quickly, use an 8cm round cookie cutter to cut 5 rounds from ice-cream mixture. Sandwich each round between 2 cookies to make 5 ice-cream sandwiches. Transfer to a baking paper-lined baking tray and freeze for 1 hour or until firm.
Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high in 30-second bursts, stirring between each burst, or until melted.

Half-dip ice-cream sandwiches into chocolate and return to tray. Freeze for 2 minutes or until chocolate has set. Transfer ice-cream sandwiches to a freezer-proof airtight container and keep frozen until ready to serve.
